Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to me is that the picture was duplicated and this made everyone alike, good and bad, pritty and ugly. No wonder the good girl with the heart of gold and butterflies saved. What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have found safe haven in Fantasy Land. They live secure lives in emerald cities, under the protection of brilliant suns and silvery moons that are comprised mostly of the gold that was taken out of circulation. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three in the series.
A group has just targeted an army base, and have stolen one and a half machine guns. With the other half of the gun is Kathie Peart, the girlfriend of Sargent Harris, the soldier she is with when they are captured
